website_summaries.verdict: Though you may have to replace O-rings or other components of the hose fittings, it is still a good buy if you want a decorative reel for your garden.
pros: Gardeners who want a reel that is both functional and pretty will love this model's ability to handle hoses up to 125 feet as well as its cast aluminum scroll work
Has shelf for garden tools and five feet of leader hose
cons: The hose fittings on the leader hose and side mount have the tendency to spring leaks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Before I even rolled up the hose, the cast aluminum cracked in two places.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Not made with any quality checks?
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! Just as others have experienced, this hose reel was delivered with a major leak. The inside hose connector was only soldered on one side. It took me longer than 30 days to get this mounted to the house so I can no longer even ask for a replacement. This is a very good looking hose reel on my house but it won't be there very long once the wife finds out that it leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!  Don't waste your Time.  Leaks terribly.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to replace a cheap plastic Suncast model that developed a slow leak. I was hoping that for the price this would be a quality product. Unfortunately I was sadly mistaken. Install was easy and very straight-forward but as soon as I turned on the water it was spraying everywhere! Attached is a video with the water turned off. You can imagine the mess it made with the pressure from the water when turned on. Too bad I can't give it Zero stars as I would.
customer_reviews.author: A. Levine

customer_reviews.title: hose connectionbreaks
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my third year with this reel and the connector breaks off. SOB! Looking if I can get a replacement part. ill keep you posted. Parts on back order for over a month... not looking like this will go well...
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second reel. The first one developed a leak internally from the pewter spigot. Couldn't get it off to change part. I love the reel otherwise, so I bought a new one. Happy to say the new one has A BRASS fitting (plus I have the brass spare I bought for the old reel. It's made of cast aluminum and does not rust. the paint on the old one had begun to flaketlt a bit, but could easily have been spray painted. Set up is easy. Screw it into the wall, put the handle on by tightening a set screw, add leader hose from faucet and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: No One Ever

customer_reviews.title: This hose reel changed my life.
customer_reviews.text: I lost my temper with a cheap plastic "box store" hose reel, I went Hulk mode on it and smashed it into smithereens in front of all my neighbors. It was terrible, children were crying. At any rate, I spent several months studying every hose reel on the market. I settled on this one. And it's absolutely perfect. I mounted it to a concrete stem wall with concrete anchors, which means you have to use a hammer drill and masonry bits. This reel is bullet proof. And if it ever starts to leak, just pop off the snap rings, and replace the o-rings. This thing will be around longer than I am. Just buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as it seems....
customer_reviews.text: We received this product and hung it up, it worked great for a few months. But the hose guide has broke we kept trying to fix it but it won't stay on track. Disappointed with the durability, we are not hard on our stuff. It's heavy and seems durable but disappointed. We purchased a similar item from Home Depot 2 years ago and it still works great and don't have any problems with it. That is our experience with this product, don't think I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Handle is the weak link but we'll see.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem i have with this unit (which is identical to the Hampton Bay model sold at Home Depot) is the handle. It has a squish, soft grip which feels like it will last all of one summer our Florida heat. It's loose on the barrel and gives an insecure feel while reeling. Where it meets the actual reel is a bit loose, too; not machined to close tolerances so it isn't as tight as it should be. I have an AMES model that is better in this regard (although that one lost it's finish within a year).
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great reel but needs a brake
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of these. The first 2 I've had for over 3 years and they work great. I also have an Eley reel which cost almost twice as much. I would recommend both. The only drawback the Liberty Garden reel has over Eley is it does not have a reel brake. If you have to untangle the hose while reeling it in, the reel will free spool and unravel. The Eley reel has a brake to hold the hose while you untangle the remaining hose.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Lasted eight months
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks nice Chain-driven hose guide Cons: Gaps in shelf are large enough for hose accessories to fall through Chain-driven hose-guide stripped out after 7 months If you're using this for light-duty garden hose and occasional watering on a patio, it's great. Looks good; appears well made. If you're using this in a medium or heavy use case or with heavy rubber hose, I can't recommend it. I used the reel with 3/4 rubber hose. I had problems almost immediately with the chain-driven hose guide. Purchased in September of 2018, in the landfill in August of 2019. Bought an Eley reel to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Liberty Garden 707 hose reel with hose guide to replace my existing Ames brand aluminum wall mounted hose reel. The mounting holes aligned perfectly and so I did not have to drill new holes. This unit is quite sturdy and there were no leaks at all having only hand tightened my attached garden hose and leader hose. The description states that it holds up to 125' of 5/8" hose, but it easily accommodates my 130' 5/8" Neverkink hose. I believe 130' is the realistic limit. Reeling in the full length of hose is a breeze and takes no more than a minute with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Coach

customer_reviews.title: Well made rust proof reel.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made reel. It is cast aluminum, and powder coated. A heavy duty leader house is included but not mounting bolts. Use stainless. The downside: if you have a great hose with a good strain relief at the connections you won't be able to use this reel without kinking at the end of the relief. The reel center is too small and the hose will drag on the wall. I had to choose between hose and reel. I kept the hose.
customer_reviews.author: D.B. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money like I did !
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and then go purchase an Eley. They aren't as pretty but at least thay are functional. Mine started acting up just two weeks past the 30 day warranty. If I would have gotten it installed in a timely fashion I wouldn't be stuck with this POC. Handle falls off, low flow through their rotating joint, can barely get a 5/8 hose on.
customer_reviews.author: oneal

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, for a novice welder
customer_reviews.text: This is aluminum, so it's lightweight and very resistant to rust. However, the welds are extremely porous, and inconsistent, some mistakes suggesting this is hand-welded and likely done by someone who doesn't care or has little experience. Hopefully it'll hold up, still feels very durable and the welds look structural, the powdercoating is beautiful, but up close it's pretty obvious. Had this been a less expensive unit, I'd be less critical of such a detail, but for $100 I'd like somthing that's had some attention to detail
customer_reviews.author: CaseyVR6

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this - trust the positive reviews. If you are wondering, it is 100% metal. No plastic parts. I was worried about the hose guide feature, but it is all solid metal. Hose guide works fantastic. I tried rolling 200' of hose, and that's too much for this reel, but that's ok. It works so well I will keep it and just shorten the hose to the maximum length I can fit on the reel.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a hose reel that was not only functional but has nice eye appeal
customer_reviews.text: This is a spendy gem but I will say it is totally worth the money. I wanted a hose reel that was not only functional but has nice eye appeal. It's hard for me to say a hose reel is beautiful but I have to...it's beautiful and very well made. It will be part of our home for many years. Just a side note a found a vintage ceramic planter trough, planted red geraniums and placed them on the shelf- kicks it up another notch :)
customer_reviews.author: Sharyet

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd one of these
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks and function enough to purchase a 2nd unit. However the edge of the wheel has too much clearance so the hose constantly gets off the wheel and it's a hassle to rewind and pull out. If the clearance was tighter this problem would not exist; I'm surprised this wasn't identified during prototype testing at the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R Zarback

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this hose reel, but it’s just not sturdy enough to hold up against my light/moderate use. The handle broke after 13 months of use, rendering the reel completely useless. I contacted Liberty Garden’s customer service department, and they informed me that the warranty period is only one year, and not three years as stated in the online warranty. They suggested I purchase a new handle. Instead, I’ll place it on the trash heap. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: THe best hose real I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: THe best hose real I have ever purchased. Worth the extra money. The plastic units seem to have a lifespan of three to five years in this climate.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: The best hose reel out there
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hose reel. I actually have five of these, one for each spigot around my house. I originally bought one at the box store, and was so pleased with the quality, look, and function, that I bought the remaining ones from AMZ. Far and away better than a trashy plastic hose hanger. It’s solid in construction, made of quality parts, has a classy look, and a functional little shelf (I store garden tools there). No leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar unit in the past but without the hose guide and it was challenging at times to roll up the hose. With the hose guide geared to the rollup mechanism, it's a snap! Only challenge was finding the studs but that wasn't this unit's problem (I would have the same challenge with any of them) but the 16" on center spacing means that once you locate the first stud the other one SHOULD be automatic. In the limited time I've had the unit installed, there's not been a single drop of a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Armtek

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: If you use your house daily, you can't live without this thing. I felt guilty spending so much on a hose reel, but after mounting it to my house and using it on a daily basis, I don't know how I ever lived without it. Its already saved me hours of time I would have spent manually rolling up my hose. Hoping this thing will last... so far after a few months no issues. Spring for the hose guide, you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Handy beautifully and practical
customer_reviews.text: Handy beautifully and practical, but the connector from the faucet to the holder corrodes an break in around 18 month. The only problem with it. I had 3.
customer_reviews.author: Nobie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking hose reel for any home.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to mount. We've had two homes and got two for each home. I have found that the Tapcon brand of masonry anchors work best. Using a flat washer backing before you screw it in. Had it mounted in less than 10 minutes. I use a small zip tie to attach the hose to the bracket that way the connection doesn't move, it stays stationary. It works well up to 100 ft of hose. I've never experienced any of the issues listed in some of the comments above. I'll buy these again and again. They really make your exterior look great. Many of my friends have bought the same reels after they saw mine.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful replacement, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a plastic hose hanger that was falling apart. Love the decorative look on the side of my brick house. Came assembled except for attaching the handle and attaching the hose. Had some difficulty in getting the hose guide to wind properly. Found out that the plastic on the hose end that helped with hand tightening was trying to guide the hose away from the proper route. Removed that and it works very good. Held my 100 ft 5/8 hose without any problems. Hardest part was drilling into the brick. Used TopCon masonry bits and screws. You can see old reel hanger along with my new Liberty 707 Decorative wall hose reel. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Herman F. East

customer_reviews.title: No more hose lying in the yard thanks to how easy this is.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Winding a house around a stationary rack not only is a pain but it inevitably results in kinks. This product installed into masonry with no problems. Well constructed and solid. Easy to pull out hose and it never kinks because it's coming off the spool. Best of all, winding hose onto spool is simple and quick although you have to hand guide it. Easily took my 100 foot hose.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Schannon

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Seldom now a days do I get to review a product that is heavy and well-made. This is a beautiful piece of equipment, and blends in nicely with my 100 year old house. This is so much better than that plastic crap that you can buy for half the cost. this is a quality product that ought to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: James Brittin

customer_reviews.title: It works well and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I did swap every bolt, nut, and screw for 316 stainless as I live on the coast. I do not use the auto hose allignment piece, I pulled the pin and locked it out. It was not smooth and kept reversing. And no, the screw replacement had nothing to do with the issue. Looking at the bar, about midway, some of the cutouts were off by a hair. Oh well still love the unit. It does not sway when rolling hose up. It was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: T.Lekas

customer_reviews.title: "A good looking wall decoration" should be a right title for this reel
customer_reviews.text: This Liberty Garden reel leaks so much that I don't use it. I don't want take it down from the wall since it would leave holes in the brick wall. Mr. Liberty, if you are reading it please, please learn from Eley reels and make a retro-fit hose connect. I will buy it.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Yoon

customer_reviews.title: rusting like crazy, had to have fitting replaced and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is under 1.5 yrs. old mounted on the wall, rusting like crazy, had to have fitting replaced and I had to jump through hoops to get them sent out on "3" items all from Liberty, BAD PURCHASE, I purchased 2 like this and 1 that pivots, they all STILL leak and the pin on the model that pivots no longer holds! Looked ok at first , Would sway anyone looking to buy to look elsewhere, it also states it will hold 125' 5/8" hose. I have 100' and it barely holds it without jamming up when you go to reel it in.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the hose reel we had on our house for ten years that had finally given out, and I am very happy with the way it looks and works. This one actually has the hose glide that my original one did not have and it makes it so much easier to roll the hose up without having to guide it. I hope it lasts as long as the other one had but honestly only time will tell, in the meantime I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Bookaholic [Nadine's Obsessed with Books]

customer_reviews.title: Buying additional for the house!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. Must pull the hose out straight and roll it up from the front. I placed this in an aesthetically pleasing spot but lost a little functionality. I have a side load garage so my yard is at a 90 degree angle from the hose bib. Will purchase 2 more for the other hoses and mount with this in mind
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 5 years of heavy use - still works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews but I am very impressed with this product. It has functioned flawlessly for 5 years. It just developed a minor leak in the feed fitting. To my surprise, a replacement part is available and relatively inexpensive. Unlike most items in today's throw-away culture - this is a great, fixable item should it wear out (and show me a rotating fitting for a hose that doesn't wear out!). Would highly recommend even to my mother!
customer_reviews.author: TxTBone

customer_reviews.title: This hose reel cart it great. There is 1 draw back the shelf is ...
customer_reviews.text: We had plastic hose reels in the past and always broke. This hose reel cart it great. There is 1 draw back the shelf is a bit small. But with the Yasorn 5-pack Stainless Steel External Hex Expansion Bolt M8x60mm, you buy separately, it goes up fast. But when you reel the hose in expect to get your hands dirty. You have to lead the hose onto the reel. My fix is reel in the hose and wash your hands after your done with the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice aluminum with powder coat finish. Comes with the supply line included....
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality hose reel. Operates quietly, smoothly and easily. The powder coat finish is excellent. The fittings do not leak at all, rare for hose reels. Installation was easy since it was replacing a plastic reel. Do not buy an extra supply hose. One is included.
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: ... of these last year for our back yard and loved it so much we bought another one this year ...
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these last year for our back yard and loved it so much we bought another one this year for our front yard. This is a solid hose reel that doesn't leak and looks great with just about any house color. The reel/handle itself is smooth and makes wrapping up your hose an effortless task. I also love that it keeps your hose off the ground and under the eave (in our case), which protects it from the weather, dirt, pavement/dirt abrasion and the awful "yeah that's gonna kink" hose pile we had until we got this reel. Strongly recommend. The little shelf on the top is awesome for sprinklers and hose attachments too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rich

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY HOSE REEL
customer_reviews.text: THIS hose reel is very well made with all-aluminum construction and extra-heavy duty solid brass fittings that is certain to give many years of trouble-free service even fully exposed to the outdoor elements! ~ In the long run you will save money and frustration in having to replace the cheaper plastic versions that deteriorate in the sun & weather after only a few years of service. ~ I used stainless steel bolts & washers to mount mine as I don't want any signs of rust over what I'm certain will be a long time this reel will be mounted in place and recommend others to also do so. This reel easily accepted 100' of 5/8" garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: LeftyM

customer_reviews.title: They start to leak at about the one year mark spraying water all over the place.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 10 of these hose reels and they all eventually fail some point. On the side of the product they have a spout that feeds water in the a hose attachment and this is where the water starts to spray out sprouting water all over the place; on my windows, walls porches, etc. I thought the reel was beautiful but for the price it should last longer or the part should be able to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality, leaks started at o-rings after 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Construction excellent, paint good. Feel like the hose connection to reel could be angled better as it causes a kink in the watering hose. My big problem, but it is after many years is the o-ring area has corroded away, will have to purchase the brass replacement, mine is aluminum from a early model.
customer_reviews.author: JenB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I based my purchase on other reviews. I was unaware that there are plastic versions that look just like this product. This one is metal, well built and very attractive. The operation is very smooth. We are a little concerned about the handle it seems a bit flimsy. We used a ziptie to secure the hose fitting as it seemed like it could get in the way. Mounting hardware does not come with the unit. Mine had to be installed into hollow concrete block. We used SLEEVE ANCHORS purchased locally. Use Wedge Anchors for solid concrete or stone. I wouldn't recommend mounting onto anything less than studs.
customer_reviews.author: Mid Century

customer_reviews.title: My third one of these!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my third Liberty hose reel and I can say that they hold up well because my first two reels have worked great with 100 feet of 5/8” hose. We added this third one to the deck with a 50’ hose and I’ve included a picture of it right after I installed it. I mounted it with concrete screws and drilled three extra holes along the top for added support. It took about fifteen minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R. Mccollum

customer_reviews.title: Crank Mechanism Broke
customer_reviews.text: This cranking and winding mechanism on this reel requires your attention to use, but at least it worked for 13 months. Then exactly one month after the warranty expiration, the crank mechanism broke, and now it is impossible to wind. Will have to throw it in the junk bin.
customer_reviews.author: Grit Boy

customer_reviews.title: Need a 45 degree fitting or non crimping wire reinforced short hose for attaching hose onto reel.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and well made. Far superior to the plastic crap. Only problem is with the fitting that the drum hose attaches, it causes the non crimping hose to crimp, need to be at a flatter angle to prevent the hose crimping. Nice brass feed hose and swivel , should hold up well. The shelf on top is very much appreciated. For sure you “get what you pay for”.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Conlyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, Very poor quality. Water connection broke after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, Very poor quality. I bought 5 of these to go around the house over the last year. and finally The quality is starting to show. The elbow near the water line connection broke after a couple months use on one of them. Now Im just waiting for the others to follow suit. the metal they use on this vital connection is crappy, feels like a cast aluminum or something weak. first it leaked then it broke/cracked Now I have 5 of these pieces of crap mounded on the exterior walls. I guess the goal here was to make an item lasts a little past the refund date.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works as described - no issues
customer_reviews.text: Unit was as expected, mounted easily as described, Hose connections did not leak, ( one month installed) daily usage. Holds 75 feet of 3/4 in commercial hose - just about full up with that thick hose. Really like not having to bend over to reach a ground based plastic reel. Given we have a very heavy hose - rolls up very easy. I did tie the leader hose (supplied) at the reel side to the frame to relieve stress on the connection point - I would recommend doing that. small tray is handling for holding the two separate nozzles/sprinkler I use. Wife likes it looks, and how easy it rolls up, so if she is happy, I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Looks great too along with my purple rubber Dram water hose (two 50’ hoses). Get the quick connectors too to quickly change from sprayer to narrow sweeper etc. Installed into a rock wall with 5/16” x 3” tapcon screws and washers.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Handle bolt
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for one year now and it’s wonderful. The only thing that I have had an issue with and it’s minor is the bolt that holds the handle on. It comes off and has to screwed back on about twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great hose reel
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure my hose would fit, so I tried to wind up my existing hose before I mounted it on the wall. My 100 foot hose fit perfectly in the hose reel. My only complaint is that it doesn't include the mounting fasteners. Had I known that, or paid more attention to the description, I would have ordered them when I purchased the hose reel. Time will tell if the finish holds up, based on the comments from others.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality and looks
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier. It is very easy to operate. The guide makes very easy to maneuver. Have I known, how practical using a long garden hose this makes, I would have bought one a long time ago. Also, looks good and doesn't make your landscape look junkie.
customer_reviews.author: Potter_Silva

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on brick wall & assembly turns freely with ease. We borrowed a friend’s hammer drill that enabled us to install in less than 10 min. Gives a vintage look to my guest cottage. Love the storage shelf for sprayer. Will see how well it survives our hot humid summers & wet winters.
customer_reviews.author: Dee W

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband just finished installing it. Like all projects, it took a few trips to the hardware store. It looks beautiful and is sturdy for our long hose. I thought it was expensive, but now that it's installed, I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Lexa

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the performance
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how difficult it is to keep the hose from getting bound up when reeling in the hose. It's sturdy and well built but I'm making it work ok. It's better than what I was doing before which was coiling it around a shepards hook. I may get used to the way it coils up after a while.
customer_reviews.author: John Gouvin

customer_reviews.title: WELL BUILT
customer_reviews.text: This model is Aluminum and will not rust. They are not impacted by the heat and sun of the desert like the plastic ones these replaced. I am very happy with the quality and over time have purchased five to replace all the older reels.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Has Brass Hardware
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my last one because after about a year, the part where the hose attached was made out of some silver colored metal... and it came apart. I was pleasantly surprised that the new ones are made out of brass and should last a long time. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: jimi C

customer_reviews.title: Item #704 recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece. Very nice. Haven’t used it a lot since I put it in it’s been raining - but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: C. mcguire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these and they are great. They are well made and I haven’t had any leaks yet. I make sure the hoses are removed before freezing temps and everything is drained. Not only do they function well, they are beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jimjo2

customer_reviews.title: Had for over 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: So we've had our reel for over three years. We have had NO problems. We use it often. Only thing is we have wore the rubber grip out on the handle but we will find something to replace that. NO rust, No leaks. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Chism

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit to replace another model like this that was about 8 years old. It works great and looks great. Since I have brick, I hoped that the mounting holes would line up right and it did perfectly. Great hose reel.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dale A. Stagg

customer_reviews.title: Quality and cute
customer_reviews.text: After the hurricane ripped the plastic hose reel off our house, I purchased this one. I love how smooth it rolls up my hose and the shelf is very handy. The quality is excellent and the style is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Art Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Reel, but don't expect it last more than 5 years outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, works well and does not leak at the swivel. This is my second unit. The first one lasted 5 years outdoors before the coating peeled off and the aluminum corroded. The original swivel was aluminum and started leaking after 4 1/2 years. This one is brass and should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: APEX

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money vs plastic
customer_reviews.text: After suffering through several plastic models that break after a few seasons I decided to splurge and get this model. Should have done it long ago as this is well made and has quality brass fittings. Very smooth to roll up the hose and doesn’t seem to bind.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: The guide system seems to work well even with the 3/4" hose I used. I have 75' of 3/4" hose on it now. I wouldn't put anymore than that on there at 3/4"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Installed on the front of our house and it looks fantastic. The metal matches our outdoor lights and garage metalwork. It is a nice addition to the overall high end look we are trying to achieve with upgrades to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Sara O.

customer_reviews.title: Decorative and functional reel hose
customer_reviews.text: We love these hose reels. We bought 2...one for the front and one for the back of the house. We bought similar about 15 years ago and were very happy to find these. They last a long time, and being around salt water that is important. It's a decorative reel that rolls the hose up neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Can I get a new handle arm ? My reel is not even a year old and it snapped off.
customer_reviews.text: Just a month short of a year and the handle snapped off at center mounting tube I have two of these one needs new O-rings and th newest one the handle issue. I do really like the look and how they work though How can I contact the manufacturer for help?
customer_reviews.author: Todd Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Handle set screw
customer_reviews.text: After removing it from the wall and taking one end off to re attach the handle to the frame due to a set screw not being properly installed it has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: James O.

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but this is a great product. Really stows the hose neatly without kinking ...
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap but this is a great product. Really stows the hose neatly without kinking and makes pulling it out easier too. I think it works best with solid rubber hoses that tend to not kink anyway. Is also much more attractive than most hose stowage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Hill

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this years ago, to save myself the daily aggravation of fighting with the hose
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I ordered this. After years of struggling to wrap the hose around the simple kind of rack, this is a tremendous relief. The crank turns like butter and the hose barely needs to be guided. It's well worth the investment. It also looks really pretty, especially with the flower pot I placed on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: erin rose

customer_reviews.title: Solid and attractive reel with worthless hose connector.
customer_reviews.text: 5 starts IN SPITE OF a really cheesy hose connecting the reel to the water supply. The hose was crimped and weakened in the container. That is where it failed first, but not for the last time. Buy a new connecting hose or [Liberty, upgrade the hose to the same splendid quality of your product starting where that hose ends]. The fit, finish, quality and attractiveness of the actual reel is great. Solid and well machined fittings. Smooth action and solid retreival. It has lasted a year and no sign of wear of the mechanism or the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Quality evident in every aspect
customer_reviews.text: Starting with the packing, quality is the best word. Brass fittings , hose , everything is top notch. Worth the moderate price over plastic. This one is aluminum and sturdy. Well done
customer_reviews.author: Beretta303

customer_reviews.title: Fissapointed!  Leaks badly!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks! And badly! The brass swivel connection is the culprit. The manufacturer has been out of stock on the replacement item 1/2” x 4-1/2” brass swivel for months!! Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: --SJ

customer_reviews.title: Handle keeps falling off
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and holds a 100 ft hose. Easy to crank the hose up after use! I am revising my earlier post. After 4 weeks the handle fell off and went and purchased a new set screw. After two tries of rolling up the hose the handle fell off again. While this looks nice.... my hose spends most of the time on the ground. Removing, throwing out and buying one that works. Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This hose reel is fabulous. It is a good, heavy duty reel and looks great on the patio. I was worried that attaching this big piece of metal to the house would look cheesy, but it does not at all. It is well constructed and not at all cheesy looking. The shelf on the top is a nice addition and is a great place to keep additional nozzles. Certainly beats the hose piled up on the patio housing bugs. We liked it so much we bought a second one for the front of our home.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Rothermel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hose reel
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this hose reel. We moved and I couldn’t live without this. It’s very sturdy and the hose winds and unwinds very easily. I love watering my plants and this makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well built. I've had no leak problems at all. I have the aluminum version so there is no rusting or corrosion. I think this will last a good number of years. I'll just have to remember to disconnect and drain it before the hard freezes arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Max Remley

customer_reviews.title: Great Spinning, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few years now in my front yard with a heavy duty hose. This is still going strong and spins freely. It was scary to bolt straight into the side of my house, but I couldn't be happier with is. This is a product that will last a long long time and I don't have to deal with breaking plastic pieces off or the reel not spinning. My hose is typically off to the side from the direction that it winds, but this thing will crank the hose back every time! A great product that I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 2 months, with VERY low use!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this product about 2 months ago. I water every other day. I don't pull on the reel or treat it with disrespect. I feel I have been using it as it was intended and the handle is broken and not working. I can't even use the hose reel at all, as I feel a part broke off on the inside. I paid $200 for this, expecting much better quality. I am extremely disapointed and not even sure how to contact the company about this. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cade

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice hose reel. It’s very sturdy and appears that it will hold up well for a long time. It looks so nice on the side of my house. The shelf is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieC

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with ours. The guide makes all the difference in the world! Heavy Stanley FatMax hose rolls up very easily thanks to the guide automatically distributing hose evenly across the reel.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Functional but missing the details
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this model to replace my Ames Hose King and thankfully the mounting pattern matched perfectly so I did not have to purchase new mounting screws. The rubber on the handle does not fully extend the length of the handle so it moves around freely which is a bit weird (see pic). Also the weld job and/or finish job on the metal is pretty disappointing (see pic). Overall the structure is sound but for the price, I am pretty disappointed in the quality of the finish.
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: The previous reviews had it about right . . .
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited after installing it - was everything I was looking for. but after only 2 months, the chain mechanism has failed and i can no longer roll up my hose . . . not sure if it's purely poor craftsmanship, or I got a "lemon". Going to contact Liberty to see if their customer service is any better than their product.
customer_reviews.author: casey s barka

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy and attractive hose reel for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I had an existing hose reel that was damaged by the construction workers when my new patio was installed. My husband indicated that we need something with the same dimensions to accommodate the current holes in the concrete wall. I reviewed several reels, and went to the company website which has all of the specifications for their products. This would be a perfect fit! I received it in the time frame indicated. The installation was easy. It is of a solid construction and rolls up the hose easily. And, it looks GREAT! I couldn't be happier. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: donna j. lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality reel at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth hose reel by Liberty Products. I have installed them for two of my customers at this point in time. I am very happy with the build quality and price point. Although the reel was made in China (which really frustrates me considering the word liberty is in the brand), it has been constructed in a way to last. The only criticism is the hose that connects the reel to the faucet. Could be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nyiri

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace another one that busted. It’s a perfect fit and works great. Came quickly and well made. I do recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Burden

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My old plastic handle broke so I had to buy a new one. If you notice the handle is on the opposite side . This product is worth the extra cash. No plastic all metal construction. It cranks like a dream. No leaks. I was able to modify which side it cranked. Do not waste your money on plastic. My plastic one did last 10 years. I believe this one will last longer than me. Truth.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but needs a better design for the 90* hose reel fitting so the first part of the garden hose doesn’t kink while rolling. It kept bending the new hose flat. Worked around it by keeping hose full of water while spooling.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dawn Rivard

customer_reviews.title: after four years....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hose reel in 2012. Now, in the spring of 2016, the o ring needs to be replaced. Otherwise, this reel has been trouble-free. The hose get rolled up regularly because it's so easy to do, and the reel is an eye-appealing piece of equipment. We also appreciate the shelf above the reel for connectors, hand sprayers and small sprinklers. I'm ordering another one for our front yard today.
customer_reviews.author: juneroses

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy materials make this holder worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very well built! This looks amazing on the side of my house and is exactly as described! I was a little disappointed this didn't come with any mounting hardware, although depending on the structure you're attaching this to, your hardware could be different than what I used. Overall this is a great product and I'd suggest it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: No more kinks and tangles
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at a good price. This mounted nicely under our upper story deck and has eliminated the headaches associated with untangling and unkinking the hose that I experienced constantly when I draped the hose over a wall-hanger. This is a great value and I feel giddy every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrbear

customer_reviews.title: looks elegant on my home! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks great on my home! Seems to be good quality only time will tell. I will be purchasing another when the price goes down.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: No more crappy plastic hose reel!
customer_reviews.text: Had to switch handle to left side for install. Website instructions for this were difficult to follow. Suggest a handle switch demo video. Now works great and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Eagle

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, but not well finished
customer_reviews.text: This is not as nice as my Rapid Reel, but it was also half the price. The powder coating is not well done. Areas were missed. The metal work was stamped and not well finished. It needed more filing before powder coating. The mechanism works well, but does not have a brake, so a heavy dangling nozzle will tend to unroll until it hits the ground. I really like the tray in top. The supplied leader hose is absolute junk. The attachments are not plastic, which is nice. The internals are plastic, so ill have to carefull blow out all water before winter.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed and while I did have to go out and buy the mounting hardware, it was good to get my hose bib to a more permanent mounting. I was able to get a 100 foot hose on with no problem. It came with brass fitting already on it. I think it is great, but I will put another review out here in a year. I wrote this when I had my first one of two installed. The second one was not brass and did leak; not so impressed with one.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Oesterreicher

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install but installing screws do not come with it you have to go buy them. Very attractive and winds easily.
customer_reviews.author: theresa Reitinger

customer_reviews.title: no hardware came with it.  four screws would’ve been nice
customer_reviews.text: I thought that for $90 there would be hardware included to mount. I have no idea what size screws are needed or if there are any special bolts or washers...etc.....not even an instruction paper or parts needed note. I’m lost and am probably gonna have to lug this thing to home depot to get the exact hardware fitted for it. not worth the cost in my opinion. and it’s not even hooked up yet so this is kind of a half truth review
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful design, easy to use and high-quality materials.. Built like it will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: It comes right out-of-the-box almost completely assembled. You just have to at the handle which is super easy to do. Installation is also easy, And quite self-explanatory. I have a super heavy duty hose, Because the water pressure is intense at my house. So it can be quite heavy two unroll and roll. My past hose roller fell apart under the pressure and weight. So far I've had this one for a month and it had no problems. It Looks like it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I've been waiting for a hose reel like this! I own 2 Eley reels that are ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for a hose reel like this! I own 2 Eley reels that are of great quality, but they have an industrial look and you have to guide the hose on by hand. The guide on this reel works quite well - though there is the occasional "snag" - and my hands stay clean when reeling in the hose. And the appearance is much nicer than the Eley reels This is a recent purchase, so can't report on longevity, but it appears to be very well built.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Bent and value not good
customer_reviews.text: This is aluminum, and it came bent when we got it. And the very next week you could get this same style for $25 cheaper at a large hardware store chain.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: enjoy my garden hose now
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. I enjoy it's aesthetic for sure. Had to have the handyman install as I wasn't about to buy a hammer drill just for the project. but it's sturdy and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Runatrail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hose reel.  High quality feeder hose and connectors.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for all my garden hoses. It's attractive, winds easily, solid ALUMINUM, and keeps the hoses off the ground for ease of use. I used to have a winder that sat on the ground--plastic, ugly, and would take up garden bed space. Also, the ground-based one always seemed low to be winding it up.
customer_reviews.author: cliffchic

product_meta.title: Liberty Garden 704 Decorative Cast Aluminum Wall Mount Garden Hose Reel, Holds 125-Feet of 5/8-Inch Hose - Bronze
product_meta.description:
Style:StandardLiberty Garden Products 704 Aluminum Decorative Wall Mounted Hose Reel is stylish and functional. This reel easily secures to walls, holding up to 125-feet of 5/8- garden hose and has 5-feet of leader hose. Simply pull out the hose for use, retract when done. A 7-inch x 14-inch shelf is perfect for holding your garden and watering tools. Made of non-rust, cast aluminum and features brass and aluminum plumbing fixtures. The durable powder coat finish resists rust. Comes fully assembled. Mounting hardware not included. Color: bronze.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Liberty Garden Products has been providing commercial distributors, professional gardeners and home gardeners with a variety of quality products for over fifteen years. We offer a complete line of the finest steel and aluminum hose reels, carts, and racks available in the market today. The model 704 Decorative Wall Mounted Hose Reel is made of all non-rust, Cast Aluminum with brass plumbing fixtures and a durable powder coat finish. This decorative unit easily secures to home or wall where it will hold up to 125 feet of 5/8-inch garden hose that is easily pulled out for use, then retracted when done. A 7-inch x 14-inch shelf is perfect for holding your garden and watering tools.
feature_bullets: Holds 125-feet of 5/8-inch garden hose (hose not included)
Constructed of non-rust, cast aluminum and feature brass and aluminum plumbing fixtures with a durable powder coat finish that is weather resistant
Easily pull your hose out for use, then rewind for storage, Comes fully assembled
Features a shelf ideal for frequently used garden tools and nozzles, 5-feet of leader hose

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,367 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
